Description: ESP LTD James Hetfield Truckster Guitar The LTD James Hetfield Truckster BLKS has a Mahogany Body with a Maple Top, Mahogany Neck and Rosewood FingerboardThis Metal Machine comes with a TonePros Locking TOM Bridge & Tailpiece LTD Locking TunersIt has a 24.75" Scale with Set-Neck Construction, Thin-U Neck Contour, and 22 Extra Jumbo FretsThe Pickups are Active EMG JH Set (b/n)The Controls are Vol/Vol/Tone with a Toggle Switch The ESP James Hetfield LTD Truckster Electric Guitar is the fifth Hetfield Signature Series guitar to carry his name since James and ESP joined forces in 1991. This latest model is manufactured to the exact specifications of James' Truckster, a modified ESP Eclipse-style stage guitar used on the St. Anger tour. This signature ESP Truckster features a multilayered finish strategically sanded through and fully distressed to simulate the original guitar.FeaturesSet-neck construction24-3/4" scaleMahogany body3-piece mahogany neck42mm standard nutThin U neck contourRosewood fingerboardFlag inlays with LTD at 12th fret22 XJ fretsEMG 81/60 active pickups2 volume and 1 tone control with 2 - 3-way toggles (toggle in upper position is inactive)Satin chrome hardwareSperzel locking tunersTonePros locking Tune-o-matic bridge with stop tailpieceWhite neck binding PAYMENT Total payment must be received within 3 days of auction end. Acceptable form of payment is Paypal. Please do not bid if you do not intend to pay. All Local Pickups have to be paid in full before pickup and buyer has to pick up the item within 5 days. RETURN POLICY Return requests must be made within 14 days after the delivered date (requests made after the 14 day period will not be accepted), and items may only be returned if one or all of the following apply: The model of the item received does not match the model of the item purchased; and/or,The item does not power on AND the package is not damaged. If the package appears to be damaged, please contact me to file a claim.*If one or all of the above conditions apply, items must be returned within 14 days after the return request has been approved (unless a different arrangement has been made with seller). If buyer fails to return the item within 14 days after return approval, the return request will become void. *All new items must be returned unopened in order to receive a refund. Other returns must have all original parts/packaging. ***ALL ITEMS WILL HAVE A SIGNATURE CONFORMATION UPON SHIPPING***
Title: ESP LTD James Hetfield Truckster Guitar
ConditionDescription: Used: An item that has been used previously. The item may have some signs of cosmetic wear, but is fully operational and functions as intended.
